text: Jab tum apni auraton ko talaq de chuko aur woh apni iddat poori karlein, to phir ismein maney na ho ke woh apne zerey tajweej shoharon se nikah karlein, jab ke woh maroof tareeqe se baham munakihat (marriage) par raazi hon. Tumhein naseehat ki jati hai ke aisi harakat hargiz na karna agar tum Allah aur roz e aakhir par iman laney wale ho, tumhare liye shaishta aur pakeeza tareeqa yahi hai ke issey baaz raho. Allah jaanta hai, tum nahin jaante
